name: LMForge-End-to-End-LLMOps-Platform-for-Multi-Model-Agents (Haohao-end)
description: [项目级] AI Agent Development Platform - Supports multiple models (OpenAI/DeepSeek/Wenxin/Tongyi), knowledge base management, workflow automation, and enterprise-grade security. Built with Flask + Vue3 + LangChain, featuring one-click Docker deployment.。来源: https://github.com/Haohao-end/LMForge-End-to-End-LLMOps-Platform-for-Multi-Model-Agents

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
AI Agent Development Platform - Supports multiple models (OpenAI/DeepSeek/Wenxin/Tongyi), knowledge base management, workflow automation, and enterprise-grade security. Built with Flask + Vue3 + LangChain, featuring one-click Docker deployment.

来源: https://github.com/Haohao-end/LMForge-End-to-End-LLMOps-Platform-for-Multi-Model-Agents
语言: Python
Stars: 569
